languages.text: "Горе-то какое... Кабы не прогневались усопшие да по палубам ходить не начали!"
"Terrible, that... Let's hope it didn't anger our dead. Wouldn't want them walking the decks!"
languages.original_text: "Горе-то какое... Кабы не прогневались усопшие да по палубам ходить не начали!"

traits.locale_text: "Terrible, that... Let's hope those dead people don't get angry and start walking the decks!"
"Terrible, that... Let's hope those dead people don't get angry and start walking the decks!"
"Terrible, that... Let's hope it didn't anger our dead. Wouldn't want them walking the decks!"
"Terrible, that... Let's hope it didn't anger our dead. Wouldn't want them walking the decks!"
"Terrible, that... Let's hope it didn't anger our dead. Wouldn't want them walking the decks!"
"Terrible, that... Let's hope it didn't anger our dead. Wouldn't want them walking the decks!"

languages.text: «Es espantoso... Esperemos que no hicieran enfadar a los muertos. ¡No me gustaría verlos por las cubiertas!».
languages.original_text: "Terrible, that... Let's hope it didn't anger our dead. Wouldn't want them walking the decks!"

traits.locale_text: «Es espantoso... Esperemos que no hicieran enfadar a los muertos. ¡No me gustaría verlos por las cubiertas!».

languages.text: 「酷い話だ…それが死者を怒らせていないことを祈ろう。デッキを歩き回ってほしくはないからな！」
languages.original_text: "Terrible, that... Let's hope it didn't anger our dead. Wouldn't want them walking the decks!"

traits.locale_text: 「酷い話だ…それが死者を怒らせていないことを祈ろう。デッキを歩き回ってほしくはないからな！」

languages.text: “这也太吓人了吧……希望那些死者不要大发雷霆，我可不想看到它们在甲板上到处游荡！”
languages.original_text: "Terrible, that... Let's hope it didn't anger our dead. Wouldn't want them walking the decks!"

traits.locale_text: “这也太吓人了吧……希望那些死者不要大发雷霆，我可不想看到它们在甲板上到处游荡！”

languages.text: "Das ist schrecklich ... Hoffentlich hat es unsere Toten nicht erzürnt. Ich würde nicht wollen, dass sie auf den Decks herumwandern!"
languages.original_text: "Terrible, that... Let's hope it didn't anger our dead. Wouldn't want them walking the decks!"

traits.locale_text: "Das ist schrecklich ... Hoffentlich hat es unsere Toten nicht erzürnt. Ich würde nicht wollen, dass sie auf den Decks herumwandern!"

languages.text: « C'est terrible... Espérons qu'ils n'ont pas troublé le repos des morts. Il ne faudrait pas qu'ils se mettent à vadrouiller sur les ponts ! »
languages.original_text: "Terrible, that... Let's hope it didn't anger our dead. Wouldn't want them walking the decks!"

traits.locale_text: « C'est terrible... Espérons qu'ils n'ont pas troublé le repos des morts. Il ne faudrait pas qu'ils se mettent à vadrouiller sur les ponts ! »

languages.text: "Korkunç be... Umarım ölülerimiz bu duruma öfkelenmez. Ayaklanıp güvertelere çıkmalarını istemeyiz ya."
languages.original_text: "Terrible, that... Let's hope it didn't anger our dead. Wouldn't want them walking the decks!"
